column4: i just tryed game which needs 300 MHZ of processor and i got 3Giga...and the game lags ...?? is this because i have linux ubuntu ? :/
notebooks tend to be a bit rubbish for gaming, because they're more about saving power and weight
but newer notebooks like XPS M1530 and acer 5920 are for gaming...they can even run crysis on medium quality..
